overview: Pola (Martyna Byczkowska) is at the peak of popularity - at the age of only 22, she fills the halls at her concerts and is very successful in the music industry. One day, after one of her performances, the girl under the influence of alcohol causes a car accident. To hush up the case, the star's father (Ireneusz Czop), and at the same time the star's manager, places her in an addiction therapy and treatment center, where the singer is forced to do community service. Soon there he meets Borys (Paweł Domagała) - a charismatic instructor, famous for his unconventional methods of work.
title: Na chwilę, na zawsze
